parameters.name: NumCoEdges
parameters.description: Number of coedges in this loop

title: ILoop2.IGetCoEdges
description: Gets the coedges in this loop.

parameters.name: NumCoEdges
parameters.description: Number of coedges in this loop

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of coedges VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ILoop2::GetCoEdgeCount
to get NumCoEdges.
